types.html:
ne pas être au bout de ses surprises

  1. to be in for more surprises, to have more surprises lying in store for one, to have more surprises coming one's way

See also

[edit]
  • ne pas être au bout de ses peines
trans: to be in for more surprises, to have more surprises lying in store for one, to have more surprises coming one's way
